com.azwave.androidzwave.distant

Class NodeToSend

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azwave.androidzwave.distant.NodeToSend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NodeToSend
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object representing a Node with only information which can interest distant applications. It's serializable to allow to send it with sockets.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NodeToSend(int _id, java.lang.String _name, java.util.ArrayList<Information> _info, java.lang.Boolean _onOffController, java.lang.Boolean _sliderController, java.lang.Boolean _mainController)
      Constructor of a NodeToSend
      NodeToSend(int _id, java.lang.String _name, java.lang.Boolean _onOffController, java.lang.Boolean _sliderController, java.lang.Boolean _mainController)
      Constructor of a NodeToSend, don't have the Informations of the node in param, so we just create an empty ArrayList.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeToSend

        public NodeToSend(int _id,
                  java.lang.String _name,
                  java.lang.Boolean _onOffController,
                  java.lang.Boolean _sliderController,
                  java.lang.Boolean _mainController)
        Constructor of a NodeToSend, don't have the Informations of the node in param, so we just create an empty ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        _id - of the node
        _name - of the node
        _onOffController - true if the node is a binary switch, else false
        _sliderController - true if the node is a multilevel switch, else false
        _mainController - true if the node is a controller, else false

      • NodeToSend

        public NodeToSend(int _id,
                  java.lang.String _name,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Information> _info,
                  java.lang.Boolean _onOffController,
                  java.lang.Boolean _sliderController,
                  java.lang.Boolean _mainController)
        Constructor of a NodeToSend
        Parameters:
        _id - of the node
        _name - of the node
        _info - ArrayList which contains all the informations return by the node
        _onOffController - true if the node is a binary switch, else false
        _sliderController - true if the node is a multilevel switch, else false
        _mainController - true if the node is a controller, else false
